decoDesc.summary: Classical mourning scene on N face. An angel, male, is standing in mourning posture, holding a drooping flower (rose?) in his right hand and a ......(downwards-pointing torch) in his left hand. A butterfly hovers over him. On the S face is sculpted an ascending angel lifting a female figure presumably the deceased) out of the sea. Both figures wear draped cloth / the angel with long sleeves, the female figure one in chiton style. The angel is pointing upwards with his left hand and holding onto the female figure's one elbow with the other. The female figure crosses her arms in front of her chest and has loose hanging, wet-looking hair.

div.ab: BENEATH THIS STONE ARE INTERRED
THE REMAINS OF
ROSA BATHURST
WHO WAS ACCIDENTLY DROWNED IN THE TIBER ON THE
11 OF MARCH 1824. WHILST ON A RIDING PARTY; OWING
TO THE SWOLLEN STATE OF THE RIVER, AND HER SPIRITED
HORSE TAKING FRIGHT. SHE WAS THE DAUGHTER
OF BENJAMIN BATHURST WHOSE DISAPPEARANCE
WHEN ON A SPECIAL MISSION TO VIENNA, SOME YEARS
SINCE, WAS. AS TRAGICAL AS UNACCOUNTABLE: NO
POSITIVE ACCOUNT OF HIS DEATH EVER HAVING BEEN
RECEIVED BY HIS DISTRACTED WIFE. HE WAS LOST
AT TWENIY SIX YEARS OF AGE.
HIS DAUGHTER WHO INHERITED HER FATHERS
PERFECTIONS, BOTH PERSONAL AND MENTAL, HAD COMPLETED
HER SIXTEENTH YEAR WHEN SHE PERISHED BY AS
DISASTROUS A FATE.
READER
WHOEVER THOU ART, WHO MAY PAUSE TO PERUSE
THIS TALE OF SORROWS,LET THIS AWFUL LESSON
OF THE INSTABILITY OF HUMAN HAPPINESS SINK DEEP
IN THY MIND.- IF THOU ART YOUNG AND LOVELY
BUILD NOT THEREON, FOR SHE WHO SLEEPS IN DEATH
UNDER THY FEET, WAS THE LOVELIEST FLOWER, EVER CROPT
IN ITS BLOOM.- SHE WAS EVERY THING THAT THE FONDEST.
HEART COULD DESIRE, OR THE EYE COVET,
THE JOY AND HOPE OF HER
WIDOWED MOTHER
WHO ERRECTS THIS POOR MEMORIAL
OF HER IRREPARABLE LOSS.
"EARLY,BRIGHT,TRANSIENT,CHASTE,AS MORNING DEW"
"SHE SPARKLED, WAS EXHALED AND WENT TO HEAVEN".
QUI SEPOLTA E'
ROSA BATHURST
CHE CAVALCANDO IN ALTRUI COMPAGNIA SULLA RIVA DEL TEVERE
PER L'ESCRESEENZA DEL FIUME E PER LOBRARE DEL SUO CAVALLO
MISERAMENTE ANNEGO A DI 14. DI MARZO, L'ANNO 1824.
FU FIGLIA DI BENIAMINO BATHURST
IL QUALE IN UNA MISSIONE SPECIALE
DIRETTO A VIENNA, SCOMPARVE NE MAI PIU SEPPESI DALL'
AFFLITA SUA MOGLIE NOVELLA O DI SUA VITA O DI SUA MORTE.
E FU PERDUTO DI ANNI 26.
SUA FIGLIA CHE NE AVEA
EREDIATATE LE DOTI TUTTE DELL'ANIMO E DELLA PERSONA
COMPIVA L'ANNO DECIMOSESTO DE SUA, ETA ALLORCHE
PERI DI UNA SORTE AL PARI DI QUELLA FUNESTISSIMA.
OH TU QUE LEGGI
QUESTA STORIA DI AFFLIZIONE E DI DOLORE
APPRENDI ALMENO DA LEI L'INSTABILITA DELLA UMANA FELICITA'
NON PI FACCIA CONFIDARE IN QUELLA NE GIOVENTU NE AMABILITA'
CHE POSSANO IN TE RITROVARSI. PERCHE COLE CITE QUE DORME
IL SONNO DELLAMORTE FU TENERISSIMO FIORE E AMABILISSIMO
FU QUANTO MAI PIU CUORE PUO DESIDERARE E OCCHIO
VEDERE PER ECCELLENZA E PU SPERANZA CARISSIMA ALLA
VEDOVA MADRE
LA QUALE NELL' AMARRIZA E NEL PIANTO
DI TANTA PERDITA ADDOLORATISSIMA
QUESTO MISERO RICORDO ALLA MEMORIA
DI LEI POSE
QUAL RUGIADA IN SUL PRIMO MATTINO
VAGA I PURA NEL CIELO ESALO'
WESTMACOTT IUNR.
